subject: Greetings,
body:
Greetings,
I am Mr. Ali Bin Ahmed Al-Kuwari, Manager Finance and Account,
Qatar Petroleum. I have  one hundred million dollars for
Investment.
Contact me if you are interested, I have all it take to move the
fund to you as a contract fund to avoid every query. I will give
you more details upon the receipt of your response.
Regards,
Ali Bin Ahmed Al-Kuwari
Finance and Account
Qatar Petroleum
Email: 
ytiiusa2@gmail.com

subject: Re:   Greetings,
body:
Hello Mr. Ali Bin Ahmed,

I hope this message finds you well. Your proposal sounds very interesting, although I must admit, it's a bit overwhelming for me. Could you please provide more details about this? How exactly would this process work?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Ismael
